price: Allāhu, kò sí ọlọ́hun kan tí ẹ gbọ́dọ̀ jọ́sìn fún ní ọ̀nà òdodo àyàfi Òun. Allāhu sì ni kí àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo gbáralé.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
